Title :
Rainwater harvesting
Description :
Rainwater harvesting. Rain water harvesting (RWH) is a technique of collection and storage of
rainwater into natural reservoirs or tanks, or the infiltration of surface water into subsurface
aquifers (before it is lost as surface runoff). One method of rainwater harvesting is rooftop
harvesting
